item.title: AI-Based Quality Control & Defect Detection Using Computer Vision in Manufacturing â€” Part 2
item.description: Part 2 of the series on defect detection, focusing on PyTorch implementation details for training and inference in a manufacturing context.

item.title: AI-Based Quality Control & Defect Detection Using Computer Vision in Manufacturing
item.description: A practical guide to defect detection using YOLOv8 and synthetic data generation with OpenCV for industrial quality control.

item.title: Outlier Detection With Autoencoders
item.description: Learn how to build an outlier detector using autoencoders in Tensorflow in only a few lines.

item.title: The practical guide for Object Detection with YOLOv5 algorithm
item.description: A detailed tutorial explaining how to efficiently train the object detection algorithm YOLOv5 on your own custom dataset using transfer learning.

item.title: Train YOLO for Object Detection on a Custom Dataset using Python
item.description: Learn about Yolov4 and Darknet to train a Custom Object Detector using Python and Google Colab.

item.title: Feature Detection, Part 1: Image Derivatives, Gradients, and Sobel Operator
item.description: An introduction to image derivatives and gradients using OpenCV, explaining how to implement Sobel and Scharr operators for edge detection.

item.title: Custom Training Pipeline for Object Detection Models
item.description: A comprehensive guide to building a custom object detection training pipeline using PyTorch, covering dataset processing, augmentations, and model integration.
